sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger➛Services Record➛Name

Hope you are doing well.
Your request has been submitted. You will receive a more detailed mail regarding your requirements once the request is approved.
Thank you for using CowiCare!

 

Stay Safe & Healthy
Regards
Team CowiCare

Hello Trigger➛Services Record➛Name

Hope you are doing well. Your request for the covid services are mentioned below:
Trigger➛Services Record➛Bed Required  

 Trigger➛Services Record➛Select Hospital➛Name of Hospital  

Trigger➛Services Record➛Name of Medicine/injection   Trigger➛Services Record➛Others

Trigger➛Services Record➛Other Requirements  

Trigger➛Services Record➛Please mention if any Specific Requirement  Trigger➛Services Record➛Veg Food Choice    

Trigger➛Services Record➛Non-Veg Food choice

We know that these times are tough due to the pandemic but we assure you that the good times are near. Your Mental Health is a Priority, Your Happiness is fundamental and Your Self-care is vital. So stay strong and take care. 
Thank you for using CowiCare!

Stay Safe and Healthy
Regards
Team CowiCare
